property.name: tez.am.am-rm.heartbeat.interval-ms.max
property.description: The maximum heartbeat interval between the AM and RM in milliseconds

property.name: tez.am.container.idle.release-timeout-max.millis
property.description: The maximum amount of time to hold on to a container if no task can be assigned to it immediately. Only active when reuse is enabled.

property.name: tez.am.container.idle.release-timeout-min.millis
property.description: The minimum amount of time to hold on to a container that is idle. Only active when reuse is enabled.

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.enabled
property.description: Configuration to specify whether container should be reused

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.locality.delay-allocation-millis
property.description: The amount of time to wait before assigning a container to the next level of locality. NODE -> RACK -> NON_LOCAL

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.non-local-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to reuse containers for non-local tasks. Active only if reuse is enabled

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.rack-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to reuse containers for rack local tasks. Active only if reuse is enabled

property.name: tez.am.launch.cluster-default.cmd-opts
property.description: Cluster default Java options for the Tez AppMaster process. These will be prepended to the properties specified via tez.am.launch.cmd-opts

property.name: tez.am.launch.cmd-opts
property.description: Java options for the Tez AppMaster process. The Xmx value is derived based on tez.am.resource.memory.mb and is 80% of the value by default. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.am.launch.env
property.description: Additional execution environment entries for tez. This is not an additive property. You must preserve the original value if you want to have access to native libraries. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.am.log.level
property.description: Root Logging level passed to the Tez app master

property.name: tez.am.max.app.attempts
property.description: Specifies the total number of time the app master will run in case recovery is triggered

property.name: tez.am.maxtaskfailures.per.node
property.description: The maximum number of allowed task attempt failures on a node before it gets marked as blacklisted

property.name: tez.am.resource.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to be used by the AppMaster

property.name: tez.am.tez-ui.history-url.template
property.description: Template to generate the History URL for a particular Tez Application. Template replaces __APPLICATION_ID__ with the actual applicationId and __HISTORY_URL_BASE__ with the value from the tez.tez-ui.history-url.base config property

property.name: tez.am.view-acls
property.description: AM view ACLs. This allows the specified users/groups to view the status of the AM and all DAGs that run within this AM. Value format: Comma separated list of users, followed by whitespace, followed by a comma separated list of groups.

property.name: tez.counters.max
property.description: The number of allowed counters for the executing DAG

property.name: tez.counters.max.groups
property.description: The number of allowed counter groups for the executing DAG

property.name: tez.generate.debug.artifacts
property.description: Generate debug artifacts such as a text representation of the submitted DAG plan

property.name: tez.grouping.max-size
property.description: Upper bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating excessively large split

property.name: tez.grouping.min-size
property.description: Lower bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating too many splits

property.name: tez.grouping.split-waves
property.description: The multiplier for available queue capacity when determining number of tasks for a Vertex. 1.7 with 100% queue available implies generating a number of tasks roughly equal to 170% of the available containers on the queue

property.name: tez.history.logging.service.class
property.description: The class to be used for logging history data. Set to org.apache.tez.dag.history.logging.impl.SimpleHistoryLoggingService to log to the filesystem specified by ${fs.defaultFS}

property.name: tez.lib.uris
property.description: Comma-delimited list of the location of the Tez libraries which will be localized for DAGs. Specifying a single .tar.gz or .tgz assumes that a compressed version of the tez libs is being used. This is uncompressed into a tezlibs directory when running containers, and tezlibs/;tezlibs/lib/ are added to the classpath (after . and .*). If multiple files are specified - files are localized as regular files, contents of directories are localized as regular files (non-recursive).

property.name: tez.runtime.compress
property.description: Whether intermediate data should be compressed or not

property.name: tez.runtime.compress.codec
property.description: The coded to be used if compressing intermediate data. Only applicable if tez.runtime.compress is enabled

property.name: tez.runtime.convert.user-payload.to.history-text
property.description: Whether to publish configuration information to History logger

property.name: tez.runtime.io.sort.mb
property.description: The size of the sort buffer when output needs to be sorted

property.name: tez.runtime.optimize.local.fetch
property.description: If the shuffle input is on the local host bypass the http fetch and access the files directly.

property.name: tez.runtime.pipelined.sorter.sort.threads
property.description: Tez runtime pipelined sorter sort threads

property.name: tez.runtime.sorter.class
property.description: Which sorter implementation to use

property.name: tez.runtime.unordered.output.buffer.size-mb
property.description: The size of the buffer when output does not require to be sorted

property.name: tez.session.am.dag.submit.timeout.secs
property.description: Time (in seconds) for which the Tez AM should wait for a DAG to be submitted before shutting down

property.name: tez.session.client.timeout.secs
property.description: Time (in seconds) to wait for AM to come up when trying to submit a DAG from the client

property.name: tez.shuffle-vertex-manager.max-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, once this fraction of source tasks have completed, all tasks on the current vertex can be scheduled. Number of tasks ready for scheduling on the current vertex scales linearly between min-fraction and max-fraction

property.name: tez.shuffle-vertex-manager.min-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, the fraction of source tasks which should complete before tasks for the current vertex are schedule

property.name: tez.staging-dir
property.description: The staging dir used while submitting DAGs

property.name: tez.task.am.heartbeat.counter.interval-ms.max
property.description: Time interval at which task counters are sent to the AM

property.name: tez.task.generate.counters.per.io
property.description: Whether to generate counters on a per-edge basis for a Tez DAG. Helpful for in-depth analysis.

property.name: tez.task.get-task.sleep.interval-ms.max
property.description: The maximum amount of time, in seconds, to wait before a task asks an AM for another task

property.name: tez.task.launch.cluster-default.cmd-opts
property.description: Cluster default Java options for tasks. These will be prepended to the properties specified via tez.task.launch.cmd-opts

property.name: tez.task.launch.cmd-opts
property.description: Java options for tasks. The Xmx value is derived based on tez.task.resource.memory.mb and is 80% of this value by default. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.task.launch.env
property.description: Additional execution environment entries for tez. This is not an additive property. You must preserve the original value if you want to have access to native libraries. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.task.max-events-per-heartbeat
property.description: Maximum number of of events to fetch from the AM by the tasks in a single heartbeat.

property.name: tez.task.resource.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to be used by launched tasks. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.tez-ui.history-url.base
property.description: Tez UI history URL

property.name: tez.use.cluster.hadoop-libs
property.description: This being true implies that the deployment is relying on hadoop jars being available on the cluster on all nodes.

property.name: tez.am.java.opts
property.description: Java options for the Tez AppMaster process. The -Xmx parameter value is generally 0.8 times tez.am.resource.memory.mb config.

property.name: tez.am.shuffle-vertex-manager.min-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, the fraction of source tasks which should complete before tasks for the current vertex are schedule

property.name: tez.am.shuffle-vertex-manager.max-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, once this fraction of source tasks have completed, all tasks on the current vertex can be scheduled. Number of tasks ready for scheduling on the current vertex scales linearly between min-fraction and max-fraction

property.name: tez.am.grouping.split-waves
property.description: The multiplier for available queue capacity when determining number of tasks for a Vertex. 1.4 with 100% queue available implies generating a number of tasks roughly equal to 140% of the available containers on the queue

property.name: tez.am.grouping.min-size
property.description: Lower bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating too many splits

property.name: tez.am.grouping.max-size
property.description: Upper bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating excessively large split

property.name: tez.am.container.session.delay-allocation-millis
property.description: The amount of time to hold on to a container if no task can be assigned to it immediately. Only active when reuse is enabled. Set to -1 to never release a container in a session

property.name: tez.am.env
property.description: Additional execution environment entries for tez. This is not an additive property. You must preserve the original value if you want to have access to native libraries.

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-output.should-compress
property.description: Whether intermediate output should be compressed or not

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-output.compress.codec
property.description: The coded to be used if compressing intermediate output. Only applicable if tez.runtime.intermediate-output.should-compress is enabled.

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-input.is-compressed
property.description: Whether intermediate input is compressed

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-input.compress.codec
property.description: The coded to be used when reading intermediate compressed input. Only applicable if tez.runtime.intermediate-input.is-compressed is enabled.

property.name: tez.yarn.ats.enabled
property.description: Whether to send history events to YARN Application Timeline Server
